workSamples.title: Federated Learning Under Resource Constraints
details: Designed and implemented software system in a team of six to locally train neural networks on client devices and aggregate them on a central server
Implemented user ability to configure neural networks in PyTorch
Constructed more complex neural network models and fine tuned compression algorithms to improve system performance

workSamples.title: Explocation
workSamples.description: Web app to explore local events on an interactive map
details: Led team of six members to develop a web app with an interactive map of local events
Implemented a REST API using Node.js and Express to process React frontend requests, get information from external APIs and query the database
Designed NoSQL database schema in MongoDB to dynamically store and retrieve user-saved event data

workSamples.title: Spotify Data Analysis v2
workSamples.description: Exploratory data analysis on identifying features that determine a song's success based on Spotify streaming data.

workSamples.title: Slime vs Me, Myself & I
workSamples.description: Exploratory analysis of augmented reinforcement learning algorithms using OpenAI Gym

workSamples.title: Spotify Data Analysis
workSamples.description: Predicting personal preference of a song by analyzing playlist data
details: Collected playlist data from Spotify API and organized it using Numpy and Pandas into a format suitable for visualization and applying machine learning algorithms
Applied different machine learning algorithms on the data using SciKit Learn and TensorFlow and explored their efficacy
